column2: AdminView is used to administer appFrame 4 application configurations relating to WellView and SiteView
ADP Workforce Now is a payroll and benefits software (cloud service).

Notarius is the only approved Association of Professional Engineers and Geoscientists of Alberta (APEGA) digital signature.  This signature is held by members of this organization and confirms the civic identity and professional designation of its members at the time of signing.  It serves as proof that the signer is in good standing and has the right to practise in the province of Alberta, in addition to ensuring the integrity of the signed documents and preventing their flasification.

Deployment Method - Local via Configuration Manager
Software Center - ConsignO Desktop 3.8.2 (user can install on any On Prem Windows 10 Device)
Pre-Requisite Software - Entrust Entelligence Security Provider 10.0 for Windows
